title: section 75(5)(a) (inserted by section 109 of the Finance Act 2007 (No. 11 of
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Stamp Duty (Designation of
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Stamp Duty (Designation of 

Exchanges and Markets) (No.1) Regulations 2021. 

(2) These Regulations come into operation on 19 February 2021.
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited stamp duty (designation exchange markets) (no.1) regulation 2021 (2) regulation come operation 19 february 2021

title: section 75(5)(a) (inserted by section 109 of the Finance Act 2007 (No. 11 of
heading: 2. For the purposes of section 75 (inserted by section 109 of the Finance
text_raw:
2. For the purposes of section 75 (inserted by section 109 of the Finance 
Act 2007 (No. 11 of 2007)) of the Stamp Duties Consolidation Act 1999 (No. 
31 of 1999), Sigma X Europe MTF is designated as a market by the Revenue 
Commissioners. 

GIVEN under my hand, 
 18 February 2021 

NIALL CODY, 
 Revenue Commissioner. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 23rd February, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [72] 3

title: section 75(5)(a) (inserted by section 109 of the Finance Act 2007 (No. 11 of
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

The purpose of these Regulations is the designation by the Revenue 
Commissioners, as on and from 19 February 2021, of Sigma X Europe MTF as 
a market for the purposes of section 75 of the Stamp Duties Consolidation Act
text_norm: explanatory note (this note part instrument purport legal interpretation.) purpose regulation designation revenue commissioner 19 february 2021 sigma x europe mtf market purpose section 75 stamp duty consolidation act

title: section 75(5)(a) (inserted by section 109 of the Finance Act 2007 (No. 11 of
heading: 1999. Section 75 provides for an exemption from stamp duty on a transfer of
text_raw:
1999. Section 75 provides for an exemption from stamp duty on a transfer of 
title to securities to an intermediary where, inter alia, 

— the intermediary is a member of an exchange or market designated by the 

Revenue Commissioners, and 

— 

the transfer of the securities is effected on the designated exchange or 
market concerned, on the Irish Stock Exchange Limited, the London 

Stock Exchange plc or any other exchange or market designated by the 
Revenue Commissioners. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [72]
